meanings.definition: A boat fitted for use as a dwelling.
meanings.sent1: Houseboats can be cozy homes on the water.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy living on houseboats to be close to nature.
meanings.sent3: Imagine a houseboat with a tiny garden floating on a lake!
meanings.sent4: The houseboats glided gracefully across the calm lake, like floating cottages.
meanings.sent5: The colorful houseboats bobbed gently in the harbor, creating a picturesque scene.

meanings.definition: A boat that serves as a residence.
meanings.sent1: Families can live together on houseboats and travel along rivers.
meanings.sent2: Houseboats offer a unique way of living, combining home and boat life.
meanings.sent3: The houseboats in the marina looked like a floating neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The houseboats lined up along the shore, forming a floating village.
meanings.sent5: Tourists were fascinated by the houseboats, each with its own charm and character.
